fields.request: Verify CP forwarder export transaction defaults
fields.request_details: From the Charger admin, use the Export transactions filter to confirm it lists only chargers flagged for forwarding and review the Network section help text. Use the Nodes admin action to create a CP Forwarder for a remote node and ensure the selected chargers now show Export transactions enabled. Open the new CP Forwarder form to verify the updated help text describes the export requirement.
